name: ShooterSpheres
description: Welcome to the world of steel and guns , fight your way from the Citadel through many areas to the city , where the magistrates are taking ordinary citizens and turning them into fighting cyborgs. Evade the deadly traps , find the keys , pickups, collectibles and powerups throughout the lands to work your way to the centronix factory to free the citizens from the warmongering grasp of the city leaders. Can you save the day? Carefull when searching where you look or you may not find what you need.
